SEARCH
Package careerhub.services.dataManagement

Class ApplicationDataService

java.lang.Object
careerhub.services.dataManagement.ApplicationDataService
public class ApplicationDataService extends Object
Service layer responsible for higher-level application management operations, sitting above the repository layer.

This class coordinates data across multiple repositories (ApplicationRepository, InternshipRepository, UserRepository) and provides domain-level behaviours used by menus and workflow services.

Responsibilities include:

  • Creating applications and maintaining cross-entity consistency
  • Fetching applications by student or internship
  • Updating application status
  • Handling student acceptance workflow
  • Processing withdrawal requests
  • Synchronising relations after CSV loading

    • ApplicationDataService

      public ApplicationDataService(ApplicationRepository appRepo, InternshipRepository internshipRepo, UserRepository userRepo)

  • Method Details

    • createApplication

      public String createApplication(String internshipId, String studentId)
      Creates a new application for a student applying to an internship.

      This method also updates the related Internship entity by adding the student's ID to its applicantIds list, maintaining the consistency expected by legacy logic and reporting features.

      Parameters:
      internshipId - the target internship
      studentId - the student applying
      Returns:
      the generated application ID

    • getApplicationsByStudent

      public List<Application> getApplicationsByStudent(String studentId)
      Retrieves all applications submitted by a specific student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - ID of the student
      Returns:
      list of applications submitted by the student

    • getApplicationsForInternship

      public List<Application> getApplicationsForInternship(String internshipId)
      Retrieves all applications submitted for a specific internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - ID of the internship
      Returns:
      list of applications related to the internship

    • setApplicationStatus

      public void setApplicationStatus(String applicationId, String status)
      Updates the status of a given application.

      This method delegates to Application.setStatus(String) and does not perform additional workflow logic.

      Parameters:
      applicationId - ID of the application
      status - new status (case-insensitive string)

    • studentAcceptPlacement

      public void studentAcceptPlacement(String studentId, String internshipId)
      Handles the student acceptance workflow:
      • Confirms the successful application
      • Increments internship confirmed count
      • Automatically marks all other applications from the student as unsuccessful

      This enforces the rule that a student may accept only one internship.

      Parameters:
      studentId - ID of the student accepting
      internshipId - ID of the internship being accepted

    • markWithdrawalRequest

      public void markWithdrawalRequest(String applicationId)
      Marks an application as having requested a withdrawal. Actual approval is handled separately by staff.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - ID of the application requesting withdrawal

    • getWithdrawalRequests

      public List<Application> getWithdrawalRequests()
      Returns all applications that have an active withdrawal request.
      Returns:
      list of applications where withdrawal has been requested

    • approveWithdrawal

      public void approveWithdrawal(String applicationId)
      Approves a withdrawal request by:
      • Setting status to Unsuccessful
      • Removing the student from the internship’s applicant list
      Parameters:
      applicationId - ID of the application being approved

    • clearApplications

      public void clearApplications()
      Clears all application data from the repository. Used during data resets or test operations.

    • deleteApplicationsByInternshipId

      public void deleteApplicationsByInternshipId(String internshipId)
      Deletes all applications for a specific internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - ID of the internship

    • getAllForSave

      public Iterable<Application> getAllForSave()
      Returns all applications for saving to CSV during shutdown.
      Returns:
      iterable collection of all Application entities

    • restoreRelationsAfterLoad

      public void restoreRelationsAfterLoad()
      Restores cross-entity relations after loading applications from CSV.

      Because CSV loading does not automatically rebuild references between applications, internships, and students, this method performs relational fixes:

      • Add missing student IDs into Internship.applicantIds
      • Call Student.applySilently(String) to rebuild applied lists

      This ensures the in-memory model is consistent with expectations of legacy code and menus.
